attributes.action: call a general election as soon as possible in the wake of the MP's expenses row
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The voting and tax paying public are fed up with the issue of MP's expenses and it is time for the Prime Minister to call an election and allow the people of Great Britian their democratic say.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
